channel.title: Zee News :Sci-Tech
channel.description: Visit Zee News for latest India news, get latest news from India and all over the world. We provide you latest celebrity news, latest bollywood news and entertainment news with fastest top stories online about cricket, sports, business, bollywood, entertainment, lifestyle, world and science to get yourself updated.

item.title: NASA's 38-year-old satellite ERBS to fall from sky this weekend, is it going to hit earth? Read details
item.author: Zee News
item.description: According to NASA the odds of injury from the falling debris of the 38-year-old satellite is about 1-in-9,400.

item.title: Gaganyaan, India's maiden human space flight, targeted for launch in 2024
item.author: Zee News
item.description: Union Minister Dr Jitendra Singh on Wednesday (December 21, 2022) said that India's maiden human space flight 'Gaganyaan' is targeted to be launched in the fourth quarter of 2024.

item.title: China successfully launches three astronauts for its under-construction space station
item.author: Zee News
item.description: China's Shenzhou-15 spaceship atop the Long March-2F Y15 carrier rocket took off with three astronauts for the country's under-construction space station.

item.title: NASA's Artemis rocket lifts off on test flight to moon, begins 'new chapter' in human lunar exploration - WATCH
item.author: Zee News
item.description: NASA's new moon rocket blasted off and marked the start of its Artemis lunar-exploration programme, named after Apollo's mythological twin sister.

item.title: NASA to re-attempt launching moon rocket Artemis I on Nov 14
item.author: Zee News
item.description: NASA's moon rocket Artemis I had been stowed away for weeks after issues with fuel leaks that thwarted the first two launch attempts and then a hurricane Ian rolled through Florida, forcing the rocket to vacate the launchpad and head for safety.

item.title: From the sun's 'evil smile' to the red lightning, the spooky pictures by NASA
item.author: Zee News
item.description: The latest images released by NASA show the sun with a smile on its face, let's find out the spooky details of outer space.

item.title: ISRO scripts history, its heaviest rocket LVM3-M2 successfully places all 36 satellites
item.author: Zee News
item.description: ISRO's heaviest rocket LVM3-M2 successfully placed 36 broadband communication satellites around 75 minutes after the rocket blasted off from the spaceport in Sriharikota.

item.title: Wildlife in 'grave danger', biodiversity declined by 69% since 1970, warns WWF
item.author: Zee News
item.description: Freshwater species populations have plunged by 83% on average since 1970 that accounts for the largest fall of any species group as per the Living Planet Report 2022.

item.title: ISRO's heaviest rocket GSLV MK3 to blast off for its first ever commercial mission on October 23
item.author: Zee News
item.description: The GSLV MK3 rocket is a three-stage heavy lift launch vehicle developed by ISRO and it will be used for its first-ever commercial launch after successfully flying four Indian national missions till date.

item.title: Artemis I Moon mission: NASA's Big Next-Generation Rocketship will launch on THIS DATE- Details here
item.author: Zee News
item.description: NASA will make a third attempt to launch the ambitious Artemis-1 mission to the Moon on November 14, details below.
